text: Write code as if it were accompanied by a violent psychopath who knows where you live
author: Steve McConnell

text: The complexity of the program grows until it exceeds the ability of the programmer
author: Arthur Bloch. Murphy's laws

text: It's very easy to walk on water and develop programs following the ToR... if they are frozen
author: I. Berard

text: What the human mind can comprehend and believe, it can achieve
author: Napoleon Hill, journalist and writer

text: Strive not for success, but for the values ​​it gives
author: Albert Einstein

text: I owe my success to never making excuses or accepting excuses from others.
author: Florence Nightingale

text: Everything has its beauty, but not everyone can see it
author: Confucius

text: The hardest thing is to start acting, everything else depends only on perseverance
author: Amelia Earhart

text: We must love life more than the meaning of life
author: I. Berard

text: It's very easy to walk on water and develop programs following the ToR... if they are frozen
author: Fedor Dostoevsky

text: Life is what happens to you while you're making plans
author: John Lennon

text: Logic can take you from point A to point B, and imagination can take you anywhere
author: Albert Einstein

text: When I let go of who I am, I become who I can be
author: Lao Tzu

text: It is always worth starting with something that sows doubt
author: Boris Strugatsky

text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life
author: Steve Jobs

text: Вы никогда не пересечете океан, если не наберетесь мужества потерять берег из виду
author: Христофор Колумб

text: Два самых важных дня в твоей жизни: день, когда ты появился на свет, и день, когда понял, зачем
author: Марк Твен

text: Слабые люди всю жизнь стараются быть не хуже других. Сильным во что бы то ни стало нужно стать лучше всех
author: Борис Акунин

text: Успех — это способность идти от поражения к поражению, не теряя оптимизма
author: Уинстон Черчилль
